name: Black Star Line - Infused - Apple Whisky
additionalNotes: Black Star Line Cigars began in earnest at El Titan de Bronze in Miami, Florida, and has since moved production to Aganorsa Leaf in Nicaragua. Black Star Line's current portfolio spans the Medium to Full range, from the medium-bodied War Witch ("Not Your Ordinary Connecticut") and Lalibela to the full-bodied El Milagro Corojo.
